title: Crick Crack, Monkey - books from the library van

content.question: The books the narrator gets from the library van are significant to her because they

choices.label: transport her to an earlier era
describe a world that does not really exist
are written mostly by Caribbean writers who live in exile
describe things and activities that are outside of her everyday experience

content.answer: describe things and activities that are outside of her everyday experience

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Identify and explain the function of a symbol.
